===Etymology===
[[ideophonic|Ideophonic]] and adverbial: A reduplication of [[紛]] (fēn, Old Chinese *''pʰɯn'' (Zhengzhang Shangfang), "silk ribbon; disordered, confused → numerous"). Attested in ''{{w|Guanzi (text)|Guanzi}}'' and ''{{w|Mencius (book)|Mengzi}}'', meaning "disorderly, confused". Possibly cognate with [[煩]] (fán, Old Chinese *''ban'', "annoyed; numerous"), [[繁]] (fán, Old Chinese *''ban'', "numerous").
